subject: Usual snowy night's work.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Wasn't the definition of insanity--doing the same thing over and over an
expecting different results--? Random mode is a little fast, as I only have
one setting for it at the moment. There is a tiny amount of white noise
mixed with the audio, as if I need that here.

 Linear aM seems to start out "I will speak to---" can't make out the rest.
Then at 4 seconds "this is good", they seem to make use of the white noise,
but this is only the first test.

 Frank-S

Wasn' he de ini ion o insani y--doing he same hing o e and o e an expec ing di e en esul s--? Random mode is a li le as , as I only ha e one se ing o i a he momen . The e is a iny amoun o whi e noise mixed wi h he audio, as i I need ha he e. 

 
 Linea aM seems o s a ou "I will speak o---" can' make ou he es . Then a 4 seconds " his is good", hey seem o make use o he whi e noise, bu his is only he i s es . 

 
 F ank-S
